org.opendaylight.controller.concepts.transform

Class CompositeConditionalTransformer<I,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.concepts.transform.CompositeConditionalTransformer<I,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Input class for transformation
    P - Product of transformation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Acceptor<I>, AggregateTransformer<I,P>, SimpleConditionalTransformer<I,P>, Transformer<I,P>

    public class CompositeConditionalTransformer<I,P>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleConditionalTransformer<I,P>, AggregateTransformer<I,P>
    Composite transformer which aggregates multiple implementation and selects the one which accepts the input.
    Author:
    Tony Tkacik
